## TerrainMaterial.supportInstancing() method

Whether this material supports hardware instancing.

Override and return `false` if per-instance data is not supported in the shader.

**Signature:**

```typescript
/** @override */
supportInstancing(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean
